cust_review: NOTE:@ This is detailed comparison between iPhone 8, X, XS & XR, after using each of them for a month.@ I am also stating the detailed battery performance of each phone.This is a long review, but its worth if you willing to spend your hard earned money.BUILT QUALITY :--------------------# iphone 8 and XR have glass front and back, ringed with metal frames (aluminum), which looks more premium and worth the price you pay. But also are susceptible  to easy damages.# iphone X and XS are made of stainless steel, which don't appears that luxurious comparatively, but are more sturdier and less prone to damage compared to 8 and XR.# Among all iphone 8 is lightest and XR heaviest, with X and XS being almost similarly weighed.# To me in this parameter, iphone 8 seems the better choice.DISPLAY :-----------# iphone 8 has smallest display(4.7") and XR the biggest(6.1"), with X and XS with same size(5.8"), so is the screen to body ratio.# Display resolution of X and XS is same and the best amongst all, while 8 and XR is same and lowest ( NOT even FHD ). Similarly, X & XS have OLED, while 8 & XR have LCD :P# According to my usage I found X & XS to be much better value for money in terms of display quality.SYSTEM PERFORMANCE :-----------------------------# I noticed XS performing slightly better than XR, though both of them have same processor. Followed by X and 8.# If you are normal user like me then you wont mind using iphone 8 over XS, as 8 can do everything that XS can easily.# I found X to be better value for money in this segment.BATTERY PERFORMANCE :------------------------------# All 4 phones are equipped with fast charging, wireless charging.# XR use to last over 20 hours with normal multitasking, with 4G ON continuously all the time.*XS use to last between 16-18 hours, X did 14-15 hours and 8 use to lasts upto 12 hours.# With Heavy multitasking, XR lasted over 11 hours, XS did over 9 hours, X lasted over 8 hours and 8 lasted upto 6 hours.# Certainly XR outshines others in battery performance.CAMERA :-----------# In this segment, I noticed iphone X to be the best among all when using Rear camera.* Colours are more punchy and true to real. Night time photography is also excellent.# XS sometimes does better over X, but not always.# Front camera of X, XS and XR are same and performs almost similarly.# Each one supports 4K, OIS, slow motion.PRICE (64GB) :---------------8 - Rs.55KX - Rs.75KXR - Rs.77kXS - Rs.99K# Here certainly 8 is winner :PP.S: you get a physical home button on iphone 8, which certainly comes handy.VERDICT :-----------After using each phone, I can conclude that if you are tight on budget then going for iphone 8 is best choice.If you have 80k to spare, then certainly go for iphone X. And if budget is not in your dictionary, then certainly go for iphone XS.To me iphone XR is not worth the price at all, except the battery performance, it doesn't have any noticeable parameter.If you already own a iphone 7, then don't upgrade unless, you have money to waste. prod_des: Phicomm Clue 3+ VoLTE smartphone was launched in April 2018. The phone comes with a 5.50-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 720 pixels by 1360 pixels. The Phicomm Clue 3+ VoLTE is powered by 1.3 GHz Octa core processor and it comes with 2 GB of RAM. The phone packs 16 GB of internal storage that can be expanded up to 128 GB via a microSD card. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Phicomm Clue 3+ VoLTE packs a 8-megapixel primary camera on the rear and a 5-megapixel front shooter for selfies. The Phicomm Clue 3+ VoLTE runs Android 7.0 and is powered by a 3000mAh removable battery. It measures 172.00 x 75.00 x 9.20 (height x width x thickness) and weighs 188.00 grams. The Phicomm Clue 3+ VoLTE is a Dual-SIM (GSM and GSM) smartphone that accepts Regular and Micro-SIM. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth, FM, 3G and 4G (with support for voLTE, Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include Proximity sensor, Accelerometer, Ambient light sensor and Gyroscope.

cust_review: Guys, I am in a confusion for about 3 weeks on which phone to buy in the sale season. Poco F1, Honor play, Zenfone 5z and OnePlus 6. These are my shortlists and I first removed op6 because I personally didn't like oneplus because of its overrated specs and camera. SD845 is capable of AI but there is no single feature (thati know of) that used AI in oxygen OS. Then I started reading the official forums of these 3 phones. In Zenfone 5z forums, there are so many people complaining of its bugs and slow updates fixing those bugs. So I removed it next. Then I started thinking extensively on what to buy in between poco F1 and Honor play.I started reading Honor play forums first. In all reviews there, I see people are very satisfied with this and there are very very few complaints in the forumsR (may be a in 20). But I am inclined towards towards sd845 of poco. So, I started reading it's forums and there, I have observed so many people complaining of its build quality and display. I am still convinced some how to compromise on these two. And thought of buying it only because of sd845. I kept on reading the forums day to day. And the complaints in the poco forums kept on increasing related to its display. I have seen one complaint related to screen bleeding in poco for which the company said it is a software issue. I didn't understand how far it is true. What I wanted is not give discouraged after investing 20K of my money. So finally I took the call and ordered HONOR PLAY. I believed in the public forums but not YouTube reviews. The forums will never give wrong data as far as I believe.5 star for the delivery. I got the order delivered on the very next day. Thanks to Amazon. Now coming to mobile,Believe me guys, this is a beast. U will never feel bad for investing ur hard earned 18k on this phone.1) the build quality is excellent. It feels very premium in hand.2) camera is awesome. The pics that I take from this phone really comes very very gud. U can follow me at @praveen_buddhavarapu in Instagram to see some samples of this camera. U won't believe me if I say the night mode is also very Gud. The entire YouTube has completely gone angry with the nightmode of this phone. But believe me guys this phone's camera is no where less to any flagship camera even in night mode.3) the gallery app. This is the most lovely thing in this phone. I have been wondering how apple used face recognition and sorts photos based on faces, places and things. The same is also being done by Honor in this phone. The gallery app sorts and orders the pics based on the location, faces, things. And the next best thing is, it creates videos of the people like how apple does in iOS gallery app.4) Histen audio feature. If u wear earphones and listen to some FLAC songs with full volume with the Histen sound mode set to auto, trust me u will feel very much involved in the song and u can definitely forget about the sorroundings (use it at high volume only in ur personal place, but please keep track of us sorroundings in public places)4) Display is awesome. I have used a mobile with amoled display previously and I use to feel very indulged when I watch HD videos in it. The fhd display in Honor play is no where inferior to the amoled display and u can find no difference at all in between the two displays.5) the massive 3750 mah battery is a great thing in this phone. I don't use dual sim though my previous phones have dual sim support. I always use only one Airtel sim. With single sim, the battery use to stand for 1 and half day completely with normal usage. Always internet was on and screen on time is around 2-3hrs in an average.6) EMUI is perfectly blended. No bugs umi identified in my personal usage except one personal suggestion. That is they have to implement the iPhone X kind of gestures as soon as possible in this. Because when we type something, the on screen home button comes exactly down the space button and in speed typing, I sometimes use to hit on the home button instead of space. So this is the only problem is faced in this. Though Honor has confirmed the iPhone X style of gestures in Pie update, I am eagerly waiting for it.7) the notification led is placed at the correct position inside the earpiece. I think all the phones should place the led inside the earpiece as it won't take any extra place there. I tested it with blue, white, orange, green  olkurs. But I think it will glow in some other colours as well.8) lastly the performance, man this is a beast. I can't say anything more. I have been using this for past one month and I never faced single hiccup with this phone. like the phone was branded, it is very smooth a gaming. I play pubg atleast 3-4 full games per day (mean 1-2 hrs daily) and I never faced any issue like lag or frame drop with this phone. The gaming suite is awesome. It won't show the annoying notifications as notification heads when we are playing any games.Finally I can say that this is a phone worth its price and worth my time I spent looking at reviews for this. I first feared that, after buying this phone, i might get a feeling that I didn't buy poco or Zenfone. But I never got such a feelong while using this. I am very much satisfied with this mobile and i'm happy that I didn't buy POCO. I don't know how many issues that I would face if I had bought poco.Hope this review helps u to decide on ur phone. Please let me know if u have any questions related to this phone. I am happy to answer.***I purchased the mobile on last week of October. Everything was fine. The performance was outstanding. The build quality was super, but yesterday my phone explode. Now I know how they implement flagship processor at such a low price tag. I don't think that they use a good quality battery.Thankfully I didn't get injuries.I don't recomend this phone to buy. Please guys stay away from this phone . Please don't buy this. prod_des: AI Dual Rear Camera Shoot amazing pictures like a pro with the Redmi Note 7S which features a 48 MP + 5 MP dual rear camera setup. 13 MP AI Front Camera With its 13 MP AI front camera, the Redmi Note 7S takes your selfie game to the next level, allowing you to click gorgeous and Instagram-worthy pictures effortlessly. Super Low-light (Night Photography) Whether it’s day or night, you will be ready to click breathtaking pictures with the Super Low-light feature. Powerful Processor Powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 660 AIE 2.2 GHz 14nm octa-core Kryo processor and 4 GB of RAM, the Redmi Note 7S is designed to enhance not only your gaming experience but also provides an overall lag-free smartphone experience. It also comes with 64 GB of storage capacity which is expandable up to 256 GB, allowing you to store your pictures, videos, and other files with ease. Stunning Display Featuring a 16-cm (6.3) FHD+ Dot Notch Display and a Full-HD+ resolution of 2340x1080 pixels, the Redmi Note 7S provides an enriched viewing experience with crisp visuals and sharp details, making watching movies on it a real pleasure. Long Battery Life Whether you’re playing games, browsing through memes, or chatting with your friends, the Redmi Note 7S keeps the entertainment going for a long time, thanks to its massive 4000 mAh battery. Ports It comes with a 3.5 mm headphone jack and a Type-C charging port which supports the Quick Charge 4.0 technology. Built to Last The Redmi Note 7S features the Corning Gorilla Glass 5 on the front and the back. It also comes with a 2.5D glass back and four reinforced corners, making it highly durable. Splash-proof Protected by P2i's pulsed plasma deposition process, the Redmi Note 7S has reduced risk of liquid damage. Thanks to its tough nano coat, you don’t need to worry about getting a few splashes on your phone anymore.

prod_des: AI Dual Rear Camera Shoot amazing pictures like a pro with the Redmi Note 7S which features a 48 MP + 5 MP dual rear camera setup. 13 MP AI Front Camera With its 13 MP AI front camera, the Redmi Note 7S takes your selfie game to the next level, allowing you to click gorgeous and Instagram-worthy pictures effortlessly. Powerful Processor Powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 660 AIE 2.2 GHz 14nm octa-core Kryo processor and 4 GB of RAM, the Redmi Note 7S is designed to enhance not only your gaming experience but also provides an overall lag-free smartphone experience. It also comes with 64 GB of storage capacity which is expandable up to 256 GB, allowing you to store your pictures, videos, and other files with ease. Stunning Display Featuring a 16-cm (6.3) FHD+ Dot Notch Display and a Full-HD+ resolution of 2340x1080 pixels, the Redmi Note 7S provides an enriched viewing experience with crisp visuals and sharp details, making watching movies on it a real pleasure. Long Battery Life Whether you’re playing games, browsing through memes, or chatting with your friends, the Redmi Note 7S keeps the entertainment going for a long time, thanks to its massive 4000 mAh battery. Ports It comes with a 3.5 mm headphone jack and a Type-C charging port which supports the Quick Charge 4.0 technology. Built to Last The Redmi Note 7S features the Corning Gorilla Glass 5 on the front and the back. It also comes with a 2.5D glass back and four reinforced corners, making it highly durable. Splash-proof Protected by P2i's pulsed plasma deposition process, the Redmi Note 7S has reduced risk of liquid damage. Thanks to its tough nano coat, you don’t need to worry about getting a few splashes on your phone anymore.

Product_name: ELV Mobile Phone Aluminium Stand/Holder for Smartphones and Tablet - Black
feature: Black aluminium phone stand: Black aluminium phone stand with lightweight and the phone stand is portable and edgy, it perfectly work with all phonesWide compatibility: Compatible with all mobile phones (all size), eBook readers and most tablets (up to 10.1 inch), even with the heavy case onPerfect for watching movies and reading: Cell phone stand perfect for desk or table to watch movies, read, sync charging your phoneRubber protected: The rubber protect the point of contact between the device and the stand keep your device from scratches and slidingWarranty: 3 months manufacturer warranty
cust_review: I use this to put my phone while it charges at night, also it is very convinient to watch videos on phone while it's on this.  I put my Kindle on it sometimes too, makes reading easy.Let tell you the good and bad of this product.Good:1) Very solid build. Made completely of heavy metal2) It is plainly visible that the design is inspired from the monitor stand of the Apple Mac Desktop, which is a good thing. Looks stylish.3) Has rubberised base and rubber straps where the phone will rest so has a good grip4) MAKE IN INDIA initiative. And that is stamped boldly on it.Now for the bad:1) Price is a bit too more than it should have been.Verdict:If you want a good stand for your phone or tablet, go for it***Build well, seems pretty sturdy. Not the best look wise , kinda looks like metal catching rust, but that doesn't affect the performance of the product. Seems like it will last a while.  However, there is one LARGE product design flaw. The distance of the phone once placed on the stand is in itself okay, but when you plug a charger in , this distance is too little, causing the charging wire to bend a lot for the phone to be able to sit snug in the stand. If you take the wire from outside and plug it in there are no issues, but if you route it through the cutout in the back of the stand, the wire bends quite a bit which could lead to it stop working and prevents the phone from sitting well on the stand.  If you don't plan on keeping your phone on the stand while charging this is a great product, but otherwise im not so sure***Really nice, sturdy little stand, with not a great, but a decent enough finish. It holds my phone and my Kindle perfectly, and I think it should manage the average tablet too. The rubber pads are very useful for stabilising the phone. The only con is that it isn't adjustable. It holds the phone at the perfect vertical or horizontal angle for while you're sitting upright, but if you're lying down, you may have to wedge some folded paper behind the phone to prop it forward if you want to change the angle. But that's really not a deal breaker for me. It also could have had a little more distance between the phone seat and the base for the charger cord, but again, not a deal breaker. You can charge the phone sideways as well. All in all, perfectly happy with the stand, it's pretty much what I needed.***If you see the below,  you will notice that the power cord has to be twisted. In the long run, the mobile charging slot would spoil.  This would have been a good product in case there would be a little for more space so that no wires are twisted in order to fit properly.  Please increase the height of the product.***Reliable.... exactly what I needed.... quite easy to refer my applications on my cell phone without engaging the hand.... and safe for replying the calls or also a perfect stand/base for my Tab {keeping it horizontally} .... extremely durable.... required only a little space.... stable and very solid.... my bedside or office table essential/must.... marvellous design and finish.... expecting more and a little bigger with same quanlity control from ELV SMART STAND.... 10 OUT OF 10....in respect of the Quality.... design.... look.... price.... uses and all promises in specifications.... Keep it up iSmart and Ofcourse AMAZON as well.... Guys go for it if at all you wish to enjoy longer..... untiring use of your cell phones /tablets....***This cell phone stand is really good as described in the listing. if the manufacturer ELV reads these comments just would like to suggest that increase the height little bit as the stand may not house the phone along with charger properly without bending the wire which in long run will lead to damaged charging cable. Apart from that the stand is of Good Quality***Nice and heavy/solid and sleek looking at just the right angle for desktop viewing/use. I am often on calls and trouble shooting app performance with customers, great to have the phone at my fingertips to use for reference as it charges. I love the size of the charger cord hole, end easily fits through but it's just small enough to not slide easily out when unplugged and drop back behind the desk as they are apt to do.***An awareness steady and firm stand I always wanted to have. Currently I am rocking an awesome OnePlus 5T and used to mount it vertically and trust me its a huge phone (though it has a very good weight distribution) but the way this stand handles it a pro level stuff. I even have snoozed multiple times my alarm while half asleep in the morning but to my surprise I found my phone steady and firmly sitting whiere I left it IN VERTICAL orientation and that's totally unexpected from a stand this small. I liked it so much that I ordered a second one for my wife very next day. Hats off to the manufacturer for the hardwork and dedicated efforts put together to make this product and A warm Thanks to Amazon for providing a marketplace for both of us.***

cust_review: Before I tell you about the music experience, you shouldn’t forget that it costs just Rs. 1499. Also, don’t expect it to offer the same experience as in wired earphones of this price segment.The build quality of the earphones is impressive. It also comes with an official IPX4 rating, so it can survive the splash of water and sweat. It is also really light in weight and weighs just 13.6 grabs. So, it is comfortable for long usage.When you turn it on or off, it also plays voice notification to let you know if it is turned on or off. For pairing it with a new device, you need to understand one important thing. When you turn it on, you need to keep pressing the power button until the LED notification starts blinking fast. This puts the earphone in the pairing mode and voice notification says “Pairing mode”.When it comes to sound clarity, it impresses. I tested it with different kinds of tracks and it was good. It is loud, so the noise of the surrounding will not affect you when you are using it. Xiaomi claims dynamic bass feature that didn’t impress. The bass is average, so it will disappoint you if you love bass heavy music. Same goes with treble. It means this earphone is not for you if you are looking for good music experience, then you will also have to increase your budget because not much options are there in this price segment. I find it good considering the priceIt supports Bluetooth 4.1 connectivity with Bluetooth profiles like HFP, A2DP, HSP, and AVRCP. As soon as you turn it on, it instantly connects to the phone it was already paired if Phone’s Bluetooth is on. It also works fine under the Bluetooth’s operating range.As it has a microphone, you can use it for hands-free calls. Just press the center button to accept the call and start talking. The microphone performs well and it captures your proper voiceIt packs 120 mAh battery and the battery lasts for around 8 hours in regular usage. My usages were mixed of tracks on high and medium sound levels with not many calls. If you will use it on high volume all the time, battery back up will be lower. The battery takes around one and a half hour in fully charging.This earphone is good for regular use when you need a Bluetooth earphone for hands-free calls and occasionally listening to music. I don’t recommend it to music freaks, but it is still good enough considering its priceThanks for reading the review.***Hey everyone, recently I have bought this earphones and I am reviewing this earphones after using it intensively. So here is my experience after using this earphones.# Packing & Box Contents:- It comes in a orange colour cardboard box and the box contents are as follows:-* Wireless Earphones* Extra Earbuds (4x)* USB cable for charging* Warranty card & instruction manual. (Images attached)# Build Quality:- The earphones have a nice build quality it's made up of plastic this makes the earphones lightweight and it can handle normal daily wear and tear for a long time.* It is light weight it will not hurt you for long usage but after using it for more than 30-40 mins it feels quite uncomfortable in my ears.* The wire is of average quality I think the wires of this earphones might not last long. (I will update my review if I see any issues with the wire)# Features:- It has a microphone so that you can accept the calls on the go.* There are three buttons  (Volume + & - these buttons can also be used to change music tracks if you press it for 2 seconds the track will change)* The hooks present in the earphones gives a good fitting in the ears.* And middle button used as a multifunction button to pause/play, accept/reject the call, power on/off.* It is water resistant so you don't have to worry if you are in rain or you got sweaty while working out. It is having a rating of IPX4.# How to use??Switching ON/OFF :- To switch to on all you have to do is press the power button which is on the right side.Pairing Mode :- For pairing when it switches on it automatically goes to Pairing mode and then you can pair it with your phone.# Sound quality:-* The sound quality is just awesome & the bass is also great.It has a nice HD audio quality.* It has a nice isolating fit and you can also enjoy your music in noisy places also. If you are not getting the perfect fit I will recommend you to try the extra buds which are given in the package.# Battery Backup :- The battery backup claimed by Xiaomi is 9 hours but in my case in one charge it can last for 7 hours which is great.# It comes with just 6 months warranty.# Verdict :- If you are looking for a wireless earphones for below 2k then you can buy this earphones without giving any second thought. You can use this while working out in gym, jogging or doing exercise. There will be no problem like the wire is disturbing you or the wire is coming in front of your face (mainly it happens in wired earphones) while you are doing any activity.* Well this is a good wireless earphones in terms of sound quality but the quality of the wires are average considering the price point of ₹1499 this is a good  wireless earphones.I am reducing one star as the quality of the wires are average.*NOTE:- It is not having the feature like if the power button is pressed for 0.5 seconds then the Google assistant will get activated which is a very helpful feature many different brands offer this feature.Thank you for reading my review. I have attached few images of the earphones.Regards,Nishant Lala.***Cons1. After reading lots of feature lost on mi site i decided to buy this product. I wont ever rate 1 star. Bcz it has lot of signal droping problem. U can't even put your phone in ur jeans pocket. Then signal will start droping. For best performance u have to keep ur phone in shirt pocket or in hand, which is practically not possible. Cant even listen a full song continuously without dropping, 100+ times signal droping. Which is very annoying2. Very delicate wires.3. Difficult to wear more than 30mins, as is design is on lil bulky side to fit.Pros.1. Sound quality is decent for the price2. Battery is good3. Overall light weight***Good quality... very nice..value for money.. thank you so much Amazon... good work... highly recommend thank you for your valuable product.***Absolutely loved it! I was unsure whether to go for Mi or Boat(as Boat's was selling for 1000 bucks at the time). But I made the right decision! It holds on to your ears like an ex girlfriend who would not leave you at all costs. The sound quality is amazing! Especially after I enabled Dolby atmos from my Samsung smart phone, the depth blew me away! As it comes with additional set of ear buds with smaller size, you can be sure that it will fit you to near perfection. Unless, that is, You have ears like Amir khan. All in all, great earphones with beautiful depth, amazing quality, wont leave your ears like that annoying office colleague during lunch.Bottom line - Buy it ASAP!***It was awesome product from mi in this price range, thanks from mi such a good froduct u will not feel uncomfortable after 2hours also the ear buds are that mach comfortable....I like it charging is good call quality is good...no noice noted .. thanks MI......***

prod_des: Honor Play boasts of dual primary camera of 16MP + 2MP and 16MP front Camera. The Smartphone is powered by Octa core HI silicon Kirin 970 Processor. Up to 6 GB of RAM will ensure phone runs smoothly even the most memory intensive applications and show no signs of lag. 64 GB of internal storage will be open for expansion up to 256 GB via a micro SD card. The phone comes with large 3750 mAh battery to support it's 16 cm (6.3 inch) screen with IPS LCD display having a resolution of 1080 x 2340 at 409 ppi.
feature: 16MP+2MP dual rear camera with scene recognition, support EIS for multi frame stabilization | 16MP front camera16.002 centimeters (6.3-inch) with 2340 x 1080 pixels resolutionMemory, Storage and SIM: 4GB RAM | 64GB internal memory expandable up to 256GB | Dual SIM dual-standby (4G+4G)Android Oreo v8.1+EMUI v8.2 operating system with 2.36GHz Kirin 970 AI Chipset octa core processor3750mAH lithium-polymer battery1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
cust_review: Guys, I am in a confusion for about 3 weeks on which phone to buy in the sale season. Poco F1, Honor play, Zenfone 5z and OnePlus 6. These are my shortlists and I first removed op6 because I personally didn't like oneplus because of its overrated specs and camera. SD845 is capable of AI but there is no single feature (thati know of) that used AI in oxygen OS. Then I started reading the official forums of these 3 phones. In Zenfone 5z forums, there are so many people complaining of its bugs and slow updates fixing those bugs. So I removed it next. Then I started thinking extensively on what to buy in between poco F1 and Honor play.I started reading Honor play forums first. In all reviews there, I see people are very satisfied with this and there are very very few complaints in the forumsR (may be a in 20). But I am inclined towards towards sd845 of poco. So, I started reading it's forums and there, I have observed so many people complaining of its build quality and display. I am still convinced some how to compromise on these two. And thought of buying it only because of sd845. I kept on reading the forums day to day. And the complaints in the poco forums kept on increasing related to its display. I have seen one complaint related to screen bleeding in poco for which the company said it is a software issue. I didn't understand how far it is true. What I wanted is not give discouraged after investing 20K of my money. So finally I took the call and ordered HONOR PLAY. I believed in the public forums but not YouTube reviews. The forums will never give wrong data as far as I believe.5 star for the delivery. I got the order delivered on the very next day. Thanks to Amazon. Now coming to mobile,Believe me guys, this is a beast. U will never feel bad for investing ur hard earned 18k on this phone.1) the build quality is excellent. It feels very premium in hand.2) camera is awesome. The pics that I take from this phone really comes very very gud. U can follow me at @praveen_buddhavarapu in Instagram to see some samples of this camera. U won't believe me if I say the night mode is also very Gud. The entire YouTube has completely gone angry with the nightmode of this phone. But believe me guys this phone's camera is no where less to any flagship camera even in night mode.3) the gallery app. This is the most lovely thing in this phone. I have been wondering how apple used face recognition and sorts photos based on faces, places and things. The same is also being done by Honor in this phone. The gallery app sorts and orders the pics based on the location, faces, things. And the next best thing is, it creates videos of the people like how apple does in iOS gallery app.4) Histen audio feature. If u wear earphones and listen to some FLAC songs with full volume with the Histen sound mode set to auto, trust me u will feel very much involved in the song and u can definitely forget about the sorroundings (use it at high volume only in ur personal place, but please keep track of us sorroundings in public places)4) Display is awesome. I have used a mobile with amoled display previously and I use to feel very indulged when I watch HD videos in it. The fhd display in Honor play is no where inferior to the amoled display and u can find no difference at all in between the two displays.5) the massive 3750 mah battery is a great thing in this phone. I don't use dual sim though my previous phones have dual sim support. I always use only one Airtel sim. With single sim, the battery use to stand for 1 and half day completely with normal usage. Always internet was on and screen on time is around 2-3hrs in an average.6) EMUI is perfectly blended. No bugs umi identified in my personal usage except one personal suggestion. That is they have to implement the iPhone X kind of gestures as soon as possible in this. Because when we type something, the on screen home button comes exactly down the space button and in speed typing, I sometimes use to hit on the home button instead of space. So this is the only problem is faced in this. Though Honor has confirmed the iPhone X style of gestures in Pie update, I am eagerly waiting for it.7) the notification led is placed at the correct position inside the earpiece. I think all the phones should place the led inside the earpiece as it won't take any extra place there. I tested it with blue, white, orange, green  olkurs. But I think it will glow in some other colours as well.8) lastly the performance, man this is a beast. I can't say anything more. I have been using this for past one month and I never faced single hiccup with this phone. like the phone was branded, it is very smooth a gaming. I play pubg atleast 3-4 full games per day (mean 1-2 hrs daily) and I never faced any issue like lag or frame drop with this phone. The gaming suite is awesome. It won't show the annoying notifications as notification heads when we are playing any games.Finally I can say that this is a phone worth its price and worth my time I spent looking at reviews for this. I first feared that, after buying this phone, i might get a feeling that I didn't buy poco or Zenfone. But I never got such a feelong while using this. I am very much satisfied with this mobile and i'm happy that I didn't buy POCO. I don't know how many issues that I would face if I had bought poco.Hope this review helps u to decide on ur phone. Please let me know if u have any questions related to this phone. I am happy to answer.***I purchased the mobile on last week of October. Everything was fine. The performance was outstanding. The build quality was super, but yesterday my phone explode. Now I know how they implement flagship processor at such a low price tag. I don't think that they use a good quality battery.Thankfully I didn't get injuries.I don't recomend this phone to buy. Please guys stay away from this phone . Please don't buy this. And those who already purchased this please use this device carefully.***Finally after one month i am writing my experience about honor play 6 GB varient. it is a good phone with good visual display. i was very confused before buying this product because of so called mobile experts on youtube some youtubers claim that camera is just OK and struggle in low light and BLA BLA but finally i bought this on my own risk and i am happy to buy it.1) Camera quality is good and it takes very sharp pictures but those who are expecting DSLR quality please don't buy it  because it is a phone which contains camera feature, if you are fond of photography then please buy a DSLR and  don't buy any phone for that.  People take selfie/ backshot and zoom it and i don't know why they do so and finally complain some noise and all  that stuff. Well this phone doesn't contain any professional lance but its camera capture good pictures in low light  too. 2) Battery backup is fabulous i am getting 3-4 battery backup by using its unique feature ultra battery saving mode.  if you are not a phone worm then you may get 3 days battery backup easily. I always put my phone on ultra battery  saving mode specially in night and when i don't use my phone.3) Gaming is also good on this phone however, i didn't play much because i play game on my PC rather phone but i  don't see any lag while playing asphalt 8.4) Build quality is solid and it feels like a premium device. i have bought a 6 GB blue color variant which looks great.5) i recommend to buy if you are not so much ambitious regarding phones.6) Yes it heats up easily while gaming and it is annoying in summer but gamers can ignore this issue.***Expected better camera performance, expected kirin 970 to be killer in gaming performance but its not upto the mark. can not compare kirin 970 to snapdragon 845 or 835, but i guess at this price point its a good phone. could get better performance with the POCOFONE. No complaints with Look of the phone, it looks beautiful***Build quality nd design best You feel a premium phone in your hand👌👌Picture quality is good only in daylight in night it struggles alot. I'm not telling that it has a worst camera for night. Compare to other device at this price range they have good one .. bt it ok for night too if you not a camera centric personGaming is best in this phone thanks to Kirin 970  nd GPU trubo . You can play pubg in HD mode without any lag .. while playing pubg for 30 min it gets little warm that's nt an issue. If you are a pubg lover go for it.👍I saw some YouTube review of this phone some tech gurus complaining about sound quality and low volume don't listen to them , sound quality is best and high volume is sufficient.Battery life go for a whole day if you play game for one hour .. if you don't.. it last for one and half day.Conclusion .. this the best phone under 20k i got it at 17k***

Product_name: Tech Sense Lab Car Mobile Phone Holder(2018) with One Touch 360 Degree Rotating for Dashboard/Windshield, for all Smartphones(Black)
feature: Extensively tested in extreme australian conditions - transformer one touch mobile holder, designed in australia, and tested rigorously for months in extreme australian weather. This is our best design for the mobile mount yet and we are confident that this is the only mount you will ever needPrioritise safety while driving - never compromise on your safety, safety of your copassengers and the safety of the people on road. Most people do not use a mobile holder because its too cumbersome or it keeps dropping. Thats why we developed the most advanced, one touch mount system that is easy to operate and secureUniversal compatibility with sturdy and secure mounting: adjustable design expands to fit almost any phone (2.1 to 3.3 inches wide) with powerful grip keeping your mobile securely fixed throughout your drive. Transformer mobile holder comes with extendable and adjustable telescopic arm which swivels in a 260arc. The highly-flexible ball-joint provides infinite viewing angles for a convenient viewing angleExtreme silicon gel suction: suction cup with integrated adhesive gel pad stays firmly fixed in place even in extreme temperatures, sticks securely to most surfaces (including textured surfaces), yet is still easily removable. Also reusable (infinite times) as it restores to actual mint condition after rinsing with water and air dryingIndustry leading 12 months warranty and peace of mind
cust_review: Writing a review after just a day of receiving and installing it.Overall, very happy with the product.Build quality:- The build quality looks pretty decent out of the box - the phone stays pretty firm in the moving car as well.- The sticky suction cup also does a good job - but only on Glass surface.- Although, I was not able to get this stuck on a textured dashboard (which i think is the case with most cars) - The company claims that it stick on textured surface as well - so maybe i am doing something wrong. I did try the 2nd lock position - but it came out anyways.- Will try and update the review for the suction when the window-glass is under hot / cold conditionsFunctional Review:- This is one of the best car holders i have come across.- While you can adjust the angle by one arm, you also can extend another arm. This extension arm is quite handy especially if your actual stick-point is a little far out.- The phone holding/locking mechanism is also impressive. Just push the phone to the back surface and it will auto lock it into position with its mechanism. Taking the phone out is also equally simple without the phone slipping out.- the phone holder is again 360 degree rotatable. So irrespective of where you mount the holder, with the 2 arms and holder mechanism, you will easily be able to keep the phone in just the right angle that you want.Its certainly an expensive product when you compare it with most other decent ones coming at half the price. But i believe its worth the extra money. Also in my view, if this proves to be good build quality over time, it is only a one time investment at least for a couple of years.Having seen a lot of people being ignorant about talking on phone while driving, i would urge every one to please avoid using phones completely while driving and for important calls and navigation, use blue-tooth headphones / speaker-phone in combination with a car phone holder.DRIVE SAFE !***The product is highly useful. Most of the cellphones can be easily held by it. It sticks firmly with the front glass of the car, can be removed easily  and Anotherproduct from Tech sense.Pros:The build quality is sturdy.It can easily hold wide variety of different mobiles.Easy to install, remove and reuse.ConsNone so far.Happy with this purchase.***Have tried it first time today and looks good so far. Build quality appears sturdy and looks like the manufacturers knew what they were doing. Would have given it 5 stars but once installed, the adjustments are bit tricky (perhaps because of the robustness but well, given the price, we expect more).Though I have separately provided "packaging feedback" to Amazon, wanted to mention here as well (as it may be a problem with the original product packaging as well) that the package was in poor shape when it arrived (the inner carton was crushed out of shape and was actually open within in the outer wrapper). The clear plastic sheet which is supposed to protect the adhesive surface until use was not attached. There was no instruction sheet. In spite of all these disappointments, when I assembled the unit and used it, it was a pleasant surprise especially because the suction/adhesive pad worked like a charm on the grainy surface of my car dashboard. So, I decided to keep it. Tech Sense have got this product bang on but packaging is poor.In any case the best car mobile mount I used so far. Hope it stands the test of time. Good job with the product, Tech Sense!***I earlier reviewed the product with 5 star rating. However, after 1 month of usage it started falling frequently. If the car is parked in hot environment it will fall off by itself. I previously reviewed that this product is better than zaap . Now I change my opinion. Those who want long lasting car mobile holder go for zaap. I have a zaap holder which I bought 2 years back and it’s still adhering very strongly. Hence my suggestion is pay little more extra and go for zaap, rather than this one. My tech sense mobile holder is useless now. The warranty of this product is just a gimmick. The company stops responding to emails regarding defective product, making you to suffer for your purchase. I dont recommend this product any more***Product looks sturdy. I am using 2 . One in my wife's car on windscreen and other in my car on dashboard since last 3 days.....Intact.Reduced one star since they have phone holding piece at center of holder bottom, which obstructs with charging cable and make phone tilt a bit while charging.***Amazing product but my IPhone has a battery case so it does not fit that perfectly maybe you can improve on itBut the delivery from Amazon was poor it got delayed multiple times they provided incorrect times of delivery and the. Finally it arrived on Sunday  when they sent a message it would be delivered on a working day***The mount is really flexible enough to find a suitable position to fix the phone either on the dashboard or the windscreen.  My car's dashboard is a little grainy but still it seems to stick on it. I am yet to test the hold by going over a really bad patch of road. One issue I found is that the two clips on the mount which latches on to the phone is sometimes pinching on the volume rockers of my phone (moto g4). I don't use any case or cover for the phone. So when I place the phone on to the mount and the latches lock on to the sides my volume is either reduced to nil or full based on the direction in which you place the phone (upside down or straight). Another issue is, if I place the phone straight up then the bottom clip hinders with the charging port. So I cannot keep the phone vertical on the mount and connect the charger cable. Resolution keep the phone upside down and wait for the screen to rotate itself 180 degrees.***This is a great product, very simple to use and it fits a variety of phones from Iphone SE to Google Pixel. Easy to mount and remove and you can use it by mounting it in any direction. You can quickly mount the phone by Quick Trigger button and also by release button the phone can be removed quickly.Good Product, fully satisfied.***

Product_name: TP-LINK TL-WR840N 300Mbps Wireless N Router (Not a Modem)
prod_des: The 300mbps wireless n router tl-wr840n v2 is a combined wired/wireless network connection device designed specifically for small business and home office networking requirements. The tl-wr840n v2 creates an exceptional and advanced wireless performance, making it ideal for streaming hd video, voip and online gaming. Also, wi-fi protected setup (wps) button on the sleek and fashionable exterior ensures wpa2 encryptions, preventing the network from outside intrusions. Tp-link's tl-wr840n is a high speed solution that is compatible with ieee 802.11B/g/n. Based on 802.11N technology, tl-wr840n v2 gives users wireless performance at up to 300mbps, which can meet your most demanding home networking needs, such as hd streaming, online gaming and large files downloading. 3 Yrs tp-link warranty.
feature: 300Mbps wireless transmission rate ideal for both bandwidth sensitive tasks and basic workEasy wireless security encryption at a push of WPS button,Backward compatible with 802.11b/g productsIP based bandwidth control allows administrators to determine how much bandwidth is allotted to each PC,Guest Network allows you to creates a seperate network to share safely with guestsWDS wireless bridge provides seamless bridging to expand your wireless network,CCA Technology - Stable Wireless SignalsParental control allows parents or administrators to establish restricted access policies for children or staff,TP-LINK Tether App lets you manage your network with easeFor technical issues call on toll free no 1800 2094 168 or write us at support.in@tp-link.comSupports Access Point mode to create a new Wi-Fi access point
cust_review: Package was half sealed by Amazon and on the tp link box. When I tried to set it up via LAN... Username and password for new router is admin for both username and password. But when I tried it.. it was wrong.. and wonderful thing is, it's WiFi SSID was named SHANNU REABEL... How this is possible. Very badly disappointed. I requested for replacement. But worst performance by Amazon***This is a followup of my earlier reviewCurrently immensely regretting my decision to buy this item. The item has already been changed 3 times and it's yet to complete even 1 year. Apart from the 1st time , which I had a replacement with in the 1st week of purchase, every time got a refurbished product from TPlink service center and developed some form of trouble within few weeks.It's "broken" again, and I'll go to their store for the 4th time. It's pros remained the same as mentioned in my earlier review (please refer below) but frequent disruption makes it completely a lost case.I'll strongly suggest not to buy this item even if it available at dirty cheap price. I've read multiple reviews mentioning experiences from other buyers. You can read it too.==========================================================Initial review #Feb'18Purchased this item after extensive research (both Offline and Online). The following is a summarized review after almost 1 month of extensive usagePros:Simple no frill designDual antenna configurationExcellent range. (Placed it at ground floor and getting excellent strength in the 1st floor)Simple setup procedure with all required features (which should be suffice for home or SOHO users)Cons:* None till nowWhy 4 Star and not 51. The first item delivered to me was defective (but got replaced seamlessly, thanks to Amazon)Defect was extremely low speed in PC although wireless speed was fine. In case you face the same get it replaced.2. it's too early to comment, if it really works for 12-15 more months; I'll come back and give it a 5 star* I come from Network/Systems background and having extensive exposure to the field of Wired/Wireless networking; hence can confirm this is an excellent item in sub 1K price range.***This is an awesome router which also supports Android mobile application. Basically you can control your router by using your Android smartphone. You just have to do is download an app called THETER and you have to install it. You can get it from Android market I mean in the Android App Store basically you can block other users from accessing the Internet or else you can simply just keep using your Internet and can manage the password and SSID but just by yourself with simple clicks.Thank You***1. Signal Strength : 9/10"The signal strength is good, slightly higher than other routers. My broadband speed is 50 Mbps and over wireless I can get almost 40 to 45 Mbps."2. Other Features : 10/10"Most special thing about this is that it has an app from which you can manage each and every basic settings of your router. Guest Network is also available."3. Easy to use : 10/10"In market TP-Link routers are the easiest routers to use & setup. Connect all wires and go to <tplinkwifi.net> then you'll get the setup page by entering the admin username & password, after that modifying the settings is very easy."4. Durability : 6/10"The white part or you'll call the main body is made of plastic which has small vents for air flow & it router doesn't heat up too much. The long black antennas are slight delicate but it does a great job.***It can't even cover 500squarefeet Area :/It's not good router :/ lot of packet lossIt can't cover your small house too :/Totally disappointed :|Using from six months :/ not even getting range in another rooms(Our flat is 500squarefeet)***The product has stopped working only after 6 months. When taken to Tp Link service centre, they said the number on the box has been scratched and it is not genuine. I want to know what step can amazon take on this instance as i cant get my router repaired and the return policy was just 1 day after purchase.***Okay to start the review, I have been using Netgear N150 router for last 4 years and this time I needed a new router since devices were increasing in my house (Google chromecast, Google Home, Laptops and mobiles). My netgear router was not able to cover even a 2-BHK and when a lot of devices were connecting at the same time, the chromecast and google home stops working which was such a pain when one person wants to listen music or to steam videos on TV.So, I finally decided and after reading a lot of reviews of different products zeroed on to this product - TP-LINK TL-WR940N Wireless-N450 Home Router (Mentioning full name since it seems amazon mixes all the reviews of different products of one brand into one list).Pros -1- The wifi range is good and comfortably covers my 2 BHK house, even after going some more distance away from home(around 20 meters) I get the range.2- Able to connect multiple devices (MIMO tech works) (including chromecast, google home) without interruptions.3- Can easily use this router as wifi range extender as well. A big plus for big homes.4- T Plink app works fine with the router and you can easily customize settings there.5- A RJ-45 cable comes inside the box, helps connecting my ACT broadband connection to laptop when there is no power.Cons-1. I got used to mutiple lights on my Netgear router, but his one has just single light. Turns blue if wifi connection is working fine and turns yellow if ISP connections breaks. Not a big concern. Just need to get used to it.***

prod_des: Panasonic KX-TSC62 SXB Corded Phone White Key Features Slim design with LCD display Speaker phone 5-Redial memory Caller ID compatible with 30 call logs. Those days have gone when there were no alternatives to traditional landline phones. But, in today's scenario the technology has advanced so much that companies are coming up with different different mediums of communication. The popularity of cell phones, VoIP, video chatting and many more is increasing day by day. But, there are still many people who love to install those old-fashioned yet easy to use landline phones. Yes, here we are talking about the traditional landline phones but with the increase in the technology the companies are manufacturing a vast number of phones which contains very many new and awe-inspiring features, designs and colors. Thus to satisfy the customers Panasonic which is a renowned name in the field of the electronic gadgets has jumped into this race and produced a new and wide range of landline phones. Panasonic KX-TSC62 SXB Corded Phone White is a landline phone which is amongst them. This phone is stupendously within your means. Apart from this it is also assembled with an alphanumeric display type marvelous feature. At the top of it this phone is completely easy to install and use. Design Coming towards the design of this Panasonic KX-TSC62 SXB Corded Phone White! This phone is wrapped in a black chassis thus it looks decent yet elegant. This is a gorgeous invention from the house of the Panasonic. Along with this awesome device comes with30 caller ID memory. You can see the name and contact number of the caller if his/her contact is saved in your landline phone. Apart from all these functionalities there are some more which are speaker, speaker volume buttons to increase or decrease the volume, flash and redial button to dial the last called number.
feature: Colour : WhiteSlim design with LCD displayThis phone is wrapped in a black chassis thus it looks decent yet elegant
cust_review: The phone is not meant for parallel connection, which is an important information that the seller should have mentioned it in product description. The manufacturer clearly printed this information on the box itself and yet a buyer will come to know it only after receiving the product. I tend to believe that this critical  information is hidden by the seller with a purpose as there is no option for refund against return.***It's  one of the good land-phone whose price less than 900. It's sound quality is good, speaker is decent. Definitely you wont get conference facility but rest of the things are above average. One negative point - displaying of caller details in display bar is not consistent. Let me explain this. Say at 8 AM you called person A. At 8:30 you got a call from person B. 9 AM you got another call from C. When you have tried to retrieve the number by presssing down button in caller ID first you should see C, then B and then A. But this order is not maintained..***I have been using Panasonic and Sony desk phones since over 28 yrs.  The first one of Panasonic Speaker and cordless is still working great.  Great Bell, Great adaptor (still running on original), Great Key Pad, Great Speech and volume, Great features ONLY the Battery for cordless unit is no longer available, and if it is, it is priced absurdly.  I have made one by modifying back home, and it has a distortion free range of over 100 ft within the home and across two floors.  This is also a Panasonic, BUT looking at the quality of phones in the past one decade, I am not sure if this Panasonic would live to the expectations.  Some times, I feel, that any other Indian brand may perform just as good or as unpredictable, though the failure rate in Indian devices is still much higher as quality assurance is not primary, nor is customer protection as good.  On such occasions, a brand that has lived over decades would best be the risk.So much is clear, if it is Panasonic or Sony, it must be Japanese, else you cant be assured of quality and its life expectancy.The speech of this device is JUST Average.  The Bell is reasonable for quiet homes to reach two rooms away.  The LCD is too weak to be able to see. The features are not of much use at least to me.  For its performance, it may not be worth more than INR 600, but only because it is Panasonic, one hopes to see its life across at least 10 yrs and that is a big doubt, hence, only 4 star for durability, but three for performance overall.I may be demanding quality for my money, but if my standards to accept rubbish were a routine, I would have rated way above 3 star.Any one reading this review till this line, may read all reviews and take a call. cust_review: Before I tell you about the music experience, you shouldn’t forget that it costs just Rs. 1499. Also, don’t expect it to offer the same experience as in wired earphones of this price segment.The build quality of the earphones is impressive. It also comes with an official IPX4 rating, so it can survive the splash of water and sweat. It is also really light in weight and weighs just 13.6 grabs. So, it is comfortable for long usage.When you turn it on or off, it also plays voice notification to let you know if it is turned on or off. For pairing it with a new device, you need to understand one important thing. When you turn it on, you need to keep pressing the power button until the LED notification starts blinking fast. This puts the earphone in the pairing mode and voice notification says “Pairing mode”.When it comes to sound clarity, it impresses. I tested it with different kinds of tracks and it was good. It is loud, so the noise of the surrounding will not affect you when you are using it. Xiaomi claims dynamic bass feature that didn’t impress. The bass is average, so it will disappoint you if you love bass heavy music. Same goes with treble. It means this earphone is not for you if you are looking for good music experience, then you will also have to increase your budget because not much options are there in this price segment. I find it good considering the priceIt supports Bluetooth 4.1 connectivity with Bluetooth profiles like HFP, A2DP, HSP, and AVRCP. As soon as you turn it on, it instantly connects to the phone it was already paired if Phone’s Bluetooth is on. It also works fine under the Bluetooth’s operating range.As it has a microphone, you can use it for hands-free calls. Just press the center button to accept the call and start talking. The microphone performs well and it captures your proper voiceIt packs 120 mAh battery and the battery lasts for around 8 hours in regular usage. My usages were mixed of tracks on high and medium sound levels with not many calls. If you will use it on high volume all the time, battery back up will be lower. The battery takes around one and a half hour in fully charging.This earphone is good for regular use when you need a Bluetooth earphone for hands-free calls and occasionally listening to music. I don’t recommend it to music freaks, but it is still good enough considering its priceThanks for reading the review.***Hey everyone, recently I have bought this earphones and I am reviewing this earphones after using it intensively. So here is my experience after using this earphones.# Packing & Box Contents:- It comes in a orange colour cardboard box and the box contents are as follows:-* Wireless Earphones* Extra Earbuds (4x)* USB cable for charging* Warranty card & instruction manual. (Images attached)# Build Quality:- The earphones have a nice build quality it's made up of plastic this makes the earphones lightweight and it can handle normal daily wear and tear for a long time.* It is light weight it will not hurt you for long usage but after using it for more than 30-40 mins it feels quite uncomfortable in my ears.* The wire is of average quality I think the wires of this earphones might not last long. (I will update my review if I see any issues with the wire)# Features:- It has a microphone so that you can accept the calls on the go.* There are three buttons  (Volume + & - these buttons can also be used to change music tracks if you press it for 2 seconds the track will change)* The hooks present in the earphones gives a good fitting in the ears.* And middle button used as a multifunction button to pause/play, accept/reject the call, power on/off.* It is water resistant so you don't have to worry if you are in rain or you got sweaty while working out. It is having a rating of IPX4.# How to use??Switching ON/OFF :- To switch to on all you have to do is press the power button which is on the right side.Pairing Mode :- For pairing when it switches on it automatically goes to Pairing mode and then you can pair it with your phone.# Sound quality:-* The sound quality is just awesome & the bass is also great.It has a nice HD audio quality.* It has a nice isolating fit and you can also enjoy your music in noisy places also. If you are not getting the perfect fit I will recommend you to try the extra buds which are given in the package.# Battery Backup :- The battery backup claimed by Xiaomi is 9 hours but in my case in one charge it can last for 7 hours which is great.# It comes with just 6 months warranty.# Verdict :- If you are looking for a wireless earphones for below 2k then you can buy this earphones without giving any second thought. cust_review: Guys, I am in a confusion for about 3 weeks on which phone to buy in the sale season. Poco F1, Honor play, Zenfone 5z and OnePlus 6. These are my shortlists and I first removed op6 because I personally didn't like oneplus because of its overrated specs and camera. SD845 is capable of AI but there is no single feature (thati know of) that used AI in oxygen OS. Then I started reading the official forums of these 3 phones. In Zenfone 5z forums, there are so many people complaining of its bugs and slow updates fixing those bugs. So I removed it next. Then I started thinking extensively on what to buy in between poco F1 and Honor play.I started reading Honor play forums first. In all reviews there, I see people are very satisfied with this and there are very very few complaints in the forumsR (may be a in 20). But I am inclined towards towards sd845 of poco. So, I started reading it's forums and there, I have observed so many people complaining of its build quality and display. I am still convinced some how to compromise on these two. And thought of buying it only because of sd845. I kept on reading the forums day to day. And the complaints in the poco forums kept on increasing related to its display. I have seen one complaint related to screen bleeding in poco for which the company said it is a software issue. I didn't understand how far it is true. What I wanted is not give discouraged after investing 20K of my money. So finally I took the call and ordered HONOR PLAY. I believed in the public forums but not YouTube reviews. The forums will never give wrong data as far as I believe.5 star for the delivery. I got the order delivered on the very next day. Thanks to Amazon. Now coming to mobile,Believe me guys, this is a beast. U will never feel bad for investing ur hard earned 18k on this phone.1) the build quality is excellent. It feels very premium in hand.2) camera is awesome. The pics that I take from this phone really comes very very gud. U can follow me at @praveen_buddhavarapu in Instagram to see some samples of this camera. U won't believe me if I say the night mode is also very Gud. The entire YouTube has completely gone angry with the nightmode of this phone. But believe me guys this phone's camera is no where less to any flagship camera even in night mode.3) the gallery app. This is the most lovely thing in this phone. I have been wondering how apple used face recognition and sorts photos based on faces, places and things. The same is also being done by Honor in this phone. The gallery app sorts and orders the pics based on the location, faces, things. And the next best thing is, it creates videos of the people like how apple does in iOS gallery app.4) Histen audio feature. If u wear earphones and listen to some FLAC songs with full volume with the Histen sound mode set to auto, trust me u will feel very much involved in the song and u can definitely forget about the sorroundings (use it at high volume only in ur personal place, but please keep track of us sorroundings in public places)4) Display is awesome. I have used a mobile with amoled display previously and I use to feel very indulged when I watch HD videos in it. The fhd display in Honor play is no where inferior to the amoled display and u can find no difference at all in between the two displays.5) the massive 3750 mah battery is a great thing in this phone. I don't use dual sim though my previous phones have dual sim support. I always use only one Airtel sim. With single sim, the battery use to stand for 1 and half day completely with normal usage. Always internet was on and screen on time is around 2-3hrs in an average.6) EMUI is perfectly blended. No bugs umi identified in my personal usage except one personal suggestion. That is they have to implement the iPhone X kind of gestures as soon as possible in this. Because when we type something, the on screen home button comes exactly down the space button and in speed typing, I sometimes use to hit on the home button instead of space. So this is the only problem is faced in this. Though Honor has confirmed the iPhone X style of gestures in Pie update, I am eagerly waiting for it.7) the notification led is placed at the correct position inside the earpiece. I think all the phones should place the led inside the earpiece as it won't take any extra place there. I tested it with blue, white, orange, green  olkurs. But I think it will glow in some other colours as well.8) lastly the performance, man this is a beast. I can't say anything more. I have been using this for past one month and I never faced single hiccup with this phone. like the phone was branded, it is very smooth a gaming. I play pubg atleast 3-4 full games per day (mean 1-2 hrs daily) and I never faced any issue like lag or frame drop with this phone. The gaming suite is awesome. It won't show the annoying notifications as notification heads when we are playing any games.Finally I can say that this is a phone worth its price and worth my time I spent looking at reviews for this. I first feared that, after buying this phone, i might get a feeling that I didn't buy poco or Zenfone. But I never got such a feelong while using this. I am very much satisfied with this mobile and i'm happy that I didn't buy POCO. I don't know how many issues that I would face if I had bought poco.Hope this review helps u to decide on ur phone. Please let me know if u have any questions related to this phone. I am happy to answer.***I purchased the mobile on last week of October. Everything was fine. The performance was outstanding. The build quality was super, but yesterday my phone explode. Now I know how they implement flagship processor at such a low price tag. I don't think that they use a good quality battery.Thankfully I didn't get injuries.I don't recomend this phone to buy. Please guys stay away from this phone . Please don't buy this. And those who already purchased this please use this device carefully.***Finally after one month i am writing my experience about honor play 6 GB varient. it is a good phone with good visual display. i was very confused before buying this product because of so called mobile experts on youtube some youtubers claim that camera is just OK and struggle in low light and BLA BLA but finally i bought this on my own risk and i am happy to buy it.1) Camera quality is good and it takes very sharp pictures but those who are expecting DSLR quality please don't buy it  because it is a phone which contains camera feature, if you are fond of photography then please buy a DSLR and  don't buy any phone for that.  People take selfie/ backshot and zoom it and i don't know why they do so and finally complain some noise and all  that stuff. Well this phone doesn't contain any professional lance but its camera capture good pictures in low light  too. 2) Battery backup is fabulous i am getting 3-4 battery backup by using its unique feature ultra battery saving mode.  if you are not a phone worm then you may get 3 days battery backup easily. I always put my phone on ultra battery  saving mode specially in night and when i don't use my phone.3) Gaming is also good on this phone however, i didn't play much because i play game on my PC rather phone but i  don't see any lag while playing asphalt 8.4) Build quality is solid and it feels like a premium device. i have bought a 6 GB blue color variant which looks great.5) i recommend to buy if you are not so much ambitious regarding phones.6) Yes it heats up easily while gaming and it is annoying in summer but gamers can ignore this issue.***Expected better camera performance, expected kirin 970 to be killer in gaming performance but its not upto the mark. can not compare kirin 970 to snapdragon 845 or 835, but i guess at this price point its a good phone. could get better performance with the POCOFONE. No complaints with Look of the phone, it looks beautiful***Build quality nd design best You feel a premium phone in your hand👌👌Picture quality is good only in daylight in night it struggles alot. I'm not telling that it has a worst camera for night. Compare to other device at this price range they have good one .. bt it ok for night too if you not a camera centric personGaming is best in this phone thanks to Kirin 970  nd GPU trubo . You can play pubg in HD mode without any lag .. while playing pubg for 30 min it gets little warm that's nt an issue. If you are a pubg lover go for it.👍I saw some YouTube review of this phone some tech gurus complaining about sound quality and low volume don't listen to them , sound quality is best and high volume is sufficient.Battery life go for a whole day if you play game for one hour .. if you don't.. it last for one and half day.Conclusion .. this the best phone under 20k i got it at 17k***

Product_name: Tech Sense Lab Car Mobile Phone Holder(2018) with One Touch 360 Degree Rotating for Dashboard/Windshield, for all Smartphones(Black)
feature: Extensively tested in extreme australian conditions - transformer one touch mobile holder, designed in australia, and tested rigorously for months in extreme australian weather. This is our best design for the mobile mount yet and we are confident that this is the only mount you will ever needPrioritise safety while driving - never compromise on your safety, safety of your copassengers and the safety of the people on road. Most people do not use a mobile holder because its too cumbersome or it keeps dropping. Thats why we developed the most advanced, one touch mount system that is easy to operate and secureUniversal compatibility with sturdy and secure mounting: adjustable design expands to fit almost any phone (2.1 to 3.3 inches wide) with powerful grip keeping your mobile securely fixed throughout your drive. Transformer mobile holder comes with extendable and adjustable telescopic arm which swivels in a 260arc. The highly-flexible ball-joint provides infinite viewing angles for a convenient viewing angleExtreme silicon gel suction: suction cup with integrated adhesive gel pad stays firmly fixed in place even in extreme temperatures, sticks securely to most surfaces (including textured surfaces), yet is still easily removable. Also reusable (infinite times) as it restores to actual mint condition after rinsing with water and air dryingIndustry leading 12 months warranty and peace of mind
cust_review: Writing a review after just a day of receiving and installing it.Overall, very happy with the product.Build quality:- The build quality looks pretty decent out of the box - the phone stays pretty firm in the moving car as well.- The sticky suction cup also does a good job - but only on Glass surface.- Although, I was not able to get this stuck on a textured dashboard (which i think is the case with most cars) - The company claims that it stick on textured surface as well - so maybe i am doing something wrong. I did try the 2nd lock position - but it came out anyways.- Will try and update the review for the suction when the window-glass is under hot / cold conditionsFunctional Review:- This is one of the best car holders i have come across.- While you can adjust the angle by one arm, you also can extend another arm. This extension arm is quite handy especially if your actual stick-point is a little far out.- The phone holding/locking mechanism is also impressive. Just push the phone to the back surface and it will auto lock it into position with its mechanism. Taking the phone out is also equally simple without the phone slipping out.- the phone holder is again 360 degree rotatable. So irrespective of where you mount the holder, with the 2 arms and holder mechanism, you will easily be able to keep the phone in just the right angle that you want.Its certainly an expensive product when you compare it with most other decent ones coming at half the price. But i believe its worth the extra money. Also in my view, if this proves to be good build quality over time, it is only a one time investment at least for a couple of years.Having seen a lot of people being ignorant about talking on phone while driving, i would urge every one to please avoid using phones completely while driving and for important calls and navigation, use blue-tooth headphones / speaker-phone in combination with a car phone holder.DRIVE SAFE !***The product is highly useful. Most of the cellphones can be easily held by it. It sticks firmly with the front glass of the car, can be removed easily  and Anotherproduct from Tech sense.Pros:The build quality is sturdy.It can easily hold wide variety of different mobiles.Easy to install, remove and reuse.ConsNone so far.Happy with this purchase.***Have tried it first time today and looks good so far. Build quality appears sturdy and looks like the manufacturers knew what they were doing. Would have given it 5 stars but once installed, the adjustments are bit tricky (perhaps because of the robustness but well, given the price, we expect more).Though I have separately provided "packaging feedback" to Amazon, wanted to mention here as well (as it may be a problem with the original product packaging as well) that the package was in poor shape when it arrived (the inner carton was crushed out of shape and was actually open within in the outer wrapper). The clear plastic sheet which is supposed to protect the adhesive surface until use was not attached. There was no instruction sheet. In spite of all these disappointments, when I assembled the unit and used it, it was a pleasant surprise especially because the suction/adhesive pad worked like a charm on the grainy surface of my car dashboard. So, I decided to keep it. Tech Sense have got this product bang on but packaging is poor.In any case the best car mobile mount I used so far. Hope it stands the test of time. Good job with the product, Tech Sense!***I earlier reviewed the product with 5 star rating. However, after 1 month of usage it started falling frequently. If the car is parked in hot environment it will fall off by itself. I previously reviewed that this product is better than zaap . Now I change my opinion. Those who want long lasting car mobile holder go for zaap. I have a zaap holder which I bought 2 years back and it’s still adhering very strongly. Hence my suggestion is pay little more extra and go for zaap, rather than this one. My tech sense mobile holder is useless now. The warranty of this product is just a gimmick. The company stops responding to emails regarding defective product, making you to suffer for your purchase. I dont recommend this product any more***Product looks sturdy. I am using 2 . One in my wife's car on windscreen and other in my car on dashboard since last 3 days.....Intact.Reduced one star since they have phone holding piece at center of holder bottom, which obstructs with charging cable and make phone tilt a bit while charging.***Amazing product but my IPhone has a battery case so it does not fit that perfectly maybe you can improve on itBut the delivery from Amazon was poor it got delayed multiple times they provided incorrect times of delivery and the. Finally it arrived on Sunday  when they sent a message it would be delivered on a working day***The mount is really flexible enough to find a suitable position to fix the phone either on the dashboard or the windscreen.  My car's dashboard is a little grainy but still it seems to stick on it. I am yet to test the hold by going over a really bad patch of road. One issue I found is that the two clips on the mount which latches on to the phone is sometimes pinching on the volume rockers of my phone (moto g4). I don't use any case or cover for the phone. So when I place the phone on to the mount and the latches lock on to the sides my volume is either reduced to nil or full based on the direction in which you place the phone (upside down or straight). Another issue is, if I place the phone straight up then the bottom clip hinders with the charging port. So I cannot keep the phone vertical on the mount and connect the charger cable. Resolution keep the phone upside down and wait for the screen to rotate itself 180 degrees.***This is a great product, very simple to use and it fits a variety of phones from Iphone SE to Google Pixel. Easy to mount and remove and you can use it by mounting it in any direction. You can quickly mount the phone by Quick Trigger button and also by release button the phone can be removed quickly.Good Product, fully satisfied.***

Product_name: TP-LINK TL-WR840N 300Mbps Wireless N Router (Not a Modem)
prod_des: The 300mbps wireless n router tl-wr840n v2 is a combined wired/wireless network connection device designed specifically for small business and home office networking requirements. The tl-wr840n v2 creates an exceptional and advanced wireless performance, making it ideal for streaming hd video, voip and online gaming. Also, wi-fi protected setup (wps) button on the sleek and fashionable exterior ensures wpa2 encryptions, preventing the network from outside intrusions. Tp-link's tl-wr840n is a high speed solution that is compatible with ieee 802.11B/g/n. Based on 802.11N technology, tl-wr840n v2 gives users wireless performance at up to 300mbps, which can meet your most demanding home networking needs, such as hd streaming, online gaming and large files downloading. 3 Yrs tp-link warranty.
feature: 300Mbps wireless transmission rate ideal for both bandwidth sensitive tasks and basic workEasy wireless security encryption at a push of WPS button,Backward compatible with 802.11b/g productsIP based bandwidth control allows administrators to determine how much bandwidth is allotted to each PC,Guest Network allows you to creates a seperate network to share safely with guestsWDS wireless bridge provides seamless bridging to expand your wireless network,CCA Technology - Stable Wireless SignalsParental control allows parents or administrators to establish restricted access policies for children or staff,TP-LINK Tether App lets you manage your network with easeFor technical issues call on toll free no 1800 2094 168 or write us at support.in@tp-link.comSupports Access Point mode to create a new Wi-Fi access point
