cust_review: Though its expensive compared to other mobile holders you get locally, I  really liked on 2 counts-(1) It has a support at the bottom for phone, so phone does not slip due to jerky ride.(2) it can be operated with one hand, so I do not have to use both my hands to put it or remove it.I am a little disappointed as the mechanism has started to get stuck after 2 weeks use, needs to be pushed harder.***I tried different models of similar products for my car. Some come off easily, especially the ones I wanted to stick on the dashboard. Then I tried this product on the windshield. I have been using it since last two months. No major issues at all. The screws underneath may need to be tightened a little bit, perhaps every 2 weeks, if one wants to avoid a little rattling sound. It's ok for 99%, but I usually become annoyed even with the slightest rattling sounds in my car.I tried to fix it in the middle of the windshield, but there was an annoying blindspot and the arm wasn't lengthy enough. So I tried to stick it in the right bottom part of the windshield, and now working just fine. I have seen reviews that it is also good for the dashboard, but I didn't wanna test my chances. I also bought a long charging cable, which reaches the phone perfectly.***This is an extremely poor quality product. The material is flimsy and I actually had to return the first one I ordered to get a replacement. But even the replacement feels so delicate in your hands that you will worry about tightening the screws, thinking they might break. The sticking of the base is good and it holds on to the car dash decently, but the mobile holder is just plain bad. There's not enough cushioning for the phone and so a small bump and the phone will pop right out of it and fall down. India is famous for it's bumpy roads and this product will work only if you are using it not on a road. The button to release is also located right behind the phone so if you accidentally put a little more pressure while operating the phone, it will open the clamps and again the phone will fall right down. My phone got damaged due to the multiple falls. If you are using a costly phone, I request you spend some money on buying a good car mount and recommend you buy something else.***It's one of the best mobile holder available in the market. Value for money is great, it's very easy to install and use. The material is high quality and looks stylish and feels good. Don't worry about reviews with low ratings, this is a great product for people who love their cars***Very nice product, quality is good. What make it different from other holders is, it works on dashboard. Using it from 1 month, no issue till now. u can rotate it to horizontal position also if you want to enjoy some videos while driving, but you should be alert also at the same time :D***Good adhesion, very flexible to use! Flawless functionality day after day! Go for it.I just loved the fact that putting the mobile is so easy on this.One update after more than year: a part of plastic broke which was to help the arm's height adjustment. So the arm is in its lowest position now. Although, the stand is still usable***It has a good build quality and I found the following issues1. arm length is not enough. If you need to place the holder on the dashboard and need the phone below the dashboard, just to avoid distraction, the arm length is not enough.2. If you park your car under the sun for an hour and then start driving, the holder will fall. Somehow the vacuum holder is not working. Again we have to fix it on the dashboard***I was confused with the multiple different reviews about the product. It's one of the best mobile holder available in the market. Value for money is great, it's very easy to install and use. The material is high quality and looks stylish and feels good as the price.  What make it different from other holders is, it works on dashboard. Good Grip.Flexible to use! Flawless functionality day after day! Go for it.***

Product_name: Portronics CLAMP X POR-926 Car-Vent Mobile Holder (Black)
prod_des: Clamp X – a patented Universal mobile Holder with cradle to hold any smartphone up to 6 inches in the car AC Air Vent. Now you can drive safely while viewing directions on the Google Map or can talk on speaker phone. You Do Not have to hold the phone in your hands anymore. Now you can drive safely while viewing directions on the Google Map or can talk on speaker phone. You Do Not have to hold the phone in your hands anymore. With Clamp X, you can safely use your smartphone to view maps or take phone calls when we use mobile phones behind the wheels. The patented one-click release button technology and adjustable side grips to accommodate your device, it’s extremely easy to mount and UN-mount the phone from the cradle. All this can be done single-handedly to add to the convenience. Any AC vent type, horizontal or vertical, thin or thick plastic vents, are easily accommodated by the unique patented design of Clamp X. So your AC vent will not dictate and decide which car mobile holder you should buy. Just ensure that the circular vents are not suited for this product. Any size of phone up to 6 inches in size like iPhone 5/6/6S/7/7 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S6, HTC,LG, Nexus, Google Pixel, HTC, MI, Nokia, GPS Device can fit easily.
feature: CLAMP X: a patented Universal mobile Holder with cradle to hold any Smartphone up to 6 inches in the car AC Air VentALL WEATHER :It is designed to with stand extreme weather conditions, hot or cold, Designed to secure your phone on smooth and bumpy roadsEASY TO USE: Simply press the button on the back to open the sides of the mount to fit your size phoneDESIGNED FOR DRIVING SAFETY: Now you can drive safely while viewing directions on the Google Map or can talk on speaker phoneFLEXIBLE YET STABLE: Enjoy the convenience of 360 Degree Rotation of your device to suit the view you want6-Months Manufacturing Warranty
cust_review: After researching on various types of mobile holders, decided to go for Portronics CLAMP-X AC vent mobile holder due to the below reasons-1. Can be clamped / unclamped onto any vent as and when required.2. Very sturdy and tight fitting which holds mobile even in the worst jerks / bumps.3. Size is perfect. Neither too big, nor too small.4. Better than the traditional sticky/suction fitting like many dashboard/glass mobile holders which tend to become loose after a certain period of time, or can get even get opened from heavy jerks.5. Chose not to go for magnetic holders as the magnet power might reduce over time.Very happy with the product and would definitely recommend to everyone. Hope the images I attached will be helpful for you.***Using it for a week now. Wanted a ac vent fixated mobile holder, hence this choice. Was not sure of the vacuum cup type of holder which i thought may not withstand our pot holed roads. It is made of good plastic material. Looks decent enough. It has 2 locking positions, one for thin vent and another for thick. It fixes only on horizontal ac vents. I have one plus 6 phone and it holds it very well. It can hold phones of 3.5 inches width and more. It has soft resting pads for the gadget. I liked the release button, which when pressed, moves the side grips sideways to release the phone for removal. Feels as if it is a hydraulic release. Only con i see is that the AUX port of the phone gets blocked by the 'bottom rest' of the device. To use the AUX port of phone one has to fix it upside down. Not a big deal. All said, i would highly recommend this clamp.***After going through 100s of products available online, I went for this as it had a decent rating and more importantly was not magnet based. Though the manufacturers claim that the magnet based holders do not damage the phone, expert opinion points at least the compass in the phone being affected (and the main purpose of me using the holder would be to use while viewing maps - with a defective compass that would not be possible).Installation: very very easy to install. Has two locking options based on the size of the air vent. There is a nut on the backside using which one can adjust how easy/hard it should be to change the angle. I like mine to be fixee and it works fine.Grip: is good and over normal city driving in Bangalore (meaning a lot of potholes and bad roads), the phone was held firmly. The cushion in the holder helps. One push release makes it very easy to use.Only con so far is that there is a slight rattle in the car after fixing it. Need to check if I can eliminate this somehow.***Very cheap product with this I've lost my ac wings***This is a nice product, the plastic quality is amazing, but unfortunately I had to return it because this did not it my Duster car AC vent. I wish the suppliers specify the variant of the car the product is supposed to fit!!!!!***After a long research I purchased this mobile holder and giving a review after travelling more than 500 km fitting this device in my car.It perfectly fits all of  air vents, have an excellent locking system. The back push button works fine and extends the holding arms to take out your mobile/GPS set.It's far better than any vaccum type holder that sticks to the windshield which mwy have chances to detach while travelling bumpy roads or on strong sunlight or may loose its capacity with time. Also doesnt provide any view obstacle as you can place it in a vent which is comfortable to view while driving.If you are a person who frequently uses GPS or have to take call while driving you can purchase it without a second thought. It is serving its purpose 100%for which it is designed.I have put 4stars and not 5 only for a single reason. When it is fitted to a horizontal vent and you put you your mobile, due to weight of the mobile the horizontal vent framework (which are adjusted for airflow - up n down) tilts a little downward directing the air flow of that vent downwards. But keeping that aside it is a perfect product for all types of road condition.***The portronics mobile holder is a useful device for use in car. It holds on to AC vents tightly. The suction type mobile holders with base sticking to glass or dashboard cannot be guaranteed to work due to wide variations of temperature in Indian Summer and winter. So this is a natural choice. But still it is not perfect as if AC vents point downwards then under the weight of mobile the holder also falls off. So if you keep AC vents upwards no trouble in using it.***After having used many of the similar products from Road Side stuff to branded ones from accessories shops, found this to be much more practical than those vacuum based ones.The material used is good and worth a brand like Portronics. Would've appreciated it at four hundred bucks instead of four four nine, but still would be ok if it lasts more than an year or so of regular use.***
